summary: Case management dashboard app. Features include active case tracking, task management with color-coded icons, and PDF export of cases with remaining tasks.

existing_features.title: On the Dashboard view, display the presenting complaint as visible information on each case card/entry, alongside the existing patient info (MRN, name, species, etc.).

Replace the open dot indicators for checklist tasks on both the Dashboard and Cases pages with meaningful icons chosen based on task type, styled with the following color scheme: Green (#22c55e) for Discharge Notes, Yellow (#eab308) for pDVM Notified, Orange (#f97316) for Labs, Purple (#a855f7) for Histo, Blue (#3b82f6) for Imaging, Red (#ef4444) for Surgery Report, Pink (#ec4899) for Culture. Use the same color-coded icon system in the ChecklistEditor and CaseCard components. Icons should be sourced from an existing icon library (e.g., lucide-react) and chosen to visually represent each task type (e.g., a file/clipboard icon for Discharge Notes, a microscope or flask for Labs, a camera or scan for Imaging, etc.).

Add a Download/Export PDF button that generates a table-formatted PDF report of all cases that have remaining (incomplete) tasks. The report must include all case fields: MRN, patient name, presenting complaint, species, sex, age, arrival date, surgery date, attending clinician, and the list of outstanding tasks per case. Each outstanding task should be displayed using its task label. The PDF should use a landscape table layout. Implement this using the existing generateCasePdf.ts infrastructure or extend it as needed.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add presenting complaint to visible information on the Dashboard page

Replace open dots with color-coded icons for task types on Dashboard and Cases pages (Green=Discharge Notes, Yellow=pDVM Notified, Orange=Labs, Purple=Histo, Blue=Imaging, Red=Surgery Report, Pink=Culture)
Add PDF export button that generates a table-formatted report of all cases with remaining tasks, including all case fields (MRN, name, presenting complaint, outstanding tasks, etc.)
